title: 4k resolution
body: Hi i got a 4k monitor and a geforce 1080 recently but league is completely unplayable on this resolution - the healthbars and minimap icons are microscopic. Is there a way to fix this? Dont suggest downscaling my resolution please i didnt buy this monitor so i can play 1080p. If this cant be fixed tell me and im just not gonna play league. Thanks.

replies.body: 4K is not fully supported right now, so the only suggestion I could offer is to downscale.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well, in case our tech team might have some other options specific to your issue.
